pci_data_integration_cli_description: Use our ovhdata-cli interface to access and manage your command-line data integrations (CLIs).
pci_data_integration_cli_auth_title_text: Authentication on the platform can be done via any user authorised to use the OVHcloud API.
pci_data_integration_cli_auth_steps: The authentication steps are as follows:
pci_data_integration_cli_auth_steps_step: select authentication type in terminal or via browser
enter the OVHcloud API user login details
pci_data_integration_cli_commands_desc: Launch {{command}} to get a list of available actions.
